body:
I discovered a panic in `bevy_picking_sprite` but the same code now exists in `main` due to the upstreaming, so I'm reporting an issue per [Discord request].

[Discord request]: https://discord.com/channels/691052431525675048/1236111180624297984/1285478171839565835

## Bevy version

`main`. I can provide more system information if requested, but I don't think it's relevant.

## What you did

Interacted with a sprite causing the sprite picking backend to run. Must have an invalid transform with NaNs.

## What went wrong

Panic.
